name.ja: 赤ちゃん大人不安コメディ
name.es: Comedia de Ansiedad Adulta de Bebé

description.en: Hilarious comedy about a baby with adult-level worries and anxieties in everyday situations
description.zh: 关于婴儿在日常情况下拥有成人水平担忧和焦虑的搞笑喜剧
description.ja: 日常の状況で大人レベルの心配や不安を持つ赤ちゃんについての陽気なコメディ
description.ko: 일상 상황에서 성인 수준의 걱정과 불안을 가진 아기에 대한 유쾌한 코미디
description.es: Comedia divertida sobre un bebé con preocupaciones y ansiedades de nivel adulto en situaciones cotidianas
description.de: Urkomische Komödie über ein Baby mit Sorgen und Ängsten auf Erwachsenenniveau in alltäglichen Situationen
description.fr: Comédie hilarante sur un bébé avec des inquiétudes et anxiétés de niveau adulte dans des situations quotidiennes
description.ar: كوميديا مرحة عن طفل لديه مخاوف وقلق بمستوى البالغين في المواقف اليومية

promptTemplate: A cinematic long take, an extreme close-up shot. The focus is on a sunlit nursery where a baby, around one year old, looks deeply sad and worried. The background features a cream-colored carpet and a baby crib, beautifully blurred to create a stunning depth of field with excellent bokeh. The camera captures a continuous action: First, the baby lifts his head, his eyes welling with tears, his expression filled with profound sorrow. He lets out a heavy, world-weary sigh, facing the camera directly. (The frame is a tight single shot on the baby; no one else appears). At this moment, a gentle, adult female voice asks from off-screen in {response_language}: '{interview_question}' Then, a black microphone enters the frame, moving into position right in front of the baby. The baby replies in a desperate, childish voice in {response_language}: '{baby_answer}' Both the interviewer and baby speak clearly in {response_language} language with appropriate accents and pronunciation.
